parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Excessive oil consumption can lead to engine failure, causing the vehicle to stall or lose power, which can result in accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle consumes an excessive amount of oil
often 1-3 quarts per week
with no signs of oil leaks. The check engine light may come on
and the vehicle may enter limp mode.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine failure can cause the vehicle to stall or lose power, resulting in accidents or leaving the driver stranded. The knocking sound can indicate engine damage, which can lead to costly repairs.
symptoms: The vehicle loses power
makes a knocking or banging sound
and may enter limp mode. The check engine light may come on
and the vehicle may stall or fail to start.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Oil plug failure can cause the engine to stall or lose power, resulting in accidents or leaving the driver stranded. The loss of oil can also lead to engine damage.
symptoms: The oil plug falls out
causing the engine to stall or lose power. The vehicle may enter limp mode
and the check engine light may come on.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine misfire can cause the vehicle to lose power, resulting in accidents or leaving the driver stranded. The misfire can also lead to engine damage.
symptoms: The vehicle shudders or makes a strange noise
and the check engine light may come on. The vehicle may enter limp mode
and the engine may misfire.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Transmission and engine issues can cause the vehicle to lose power, resulting in accidents or leaving the driver stranded. These issues can also lead to costly repairs.
symptoms: The vehicle experiences transmission issues
such as slipping or hesitation
and engine issues
such as stalling or loss of power.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the headlights can cause reduced visibility, increasing the risk of accidents, especially at night or in low-light conditions.
symptoms: Headlights short out while driving
no warning
replacement of headlights and bulbs multiple times
flickering or failure to turn on.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the engine can cause the vehicle to lose power, stall, or catch fire, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Engine light flashing
knocking sound
loss of speed
engine failure
code 1326 for engine.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the anti-theft system can make the vehicle vulnerable to theft, resulting in financial losses and potential safety risks.
symptoms: Vehicle stolen using a USB cord/charger block
no notification from the dealership or Kia about needed software upgrade
easy to steal using a simple tool.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The lack of an immobilizer can make the vehicle uninsurable, leaving the owner without financial protection in case of an accident or theft.
symptoms: Unable to get insurance due to the lack of an immobilizer.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A faulty ABS module can cause the vehicle to refuse to brake sometimes, leading to a safety risk and potential accidents.
symptoms: Spongy
unresponsive brake pedal
vehicle refuses to brake
ABS module failure confirmed by professional auto shops.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Premature engine wear and failure can cause the vehicle to lose power, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: Metal shavings in the oil
clicking noise
loss of power
especially when accelerating above 30 miles per hour.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Brake pedal movement and instability can cause the vehicle to lose braking ability, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: Brake pedal moves left to right when pressed or moved by hand
feeling of instability when braking.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Brake failure and disengagement can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: Brakes disengage when hitting a bump
feeling of losing control of the vehicle
brake problems persist despite repairs.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A faulty forward collision warning system can cause the vehicle to fail to detect potential collisions, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: FCW system fails to detect cars in front
fails to warn of imminent collisions
system does not activate under any circumstances.
